value.benchmark_index: Nifty  50  Equal Weight Total Return Index

fund_manager.name: Name and Designation of the fund manager

value.main_scheme_name: Motilal Oswal Nifty 50 Equal Weight ETF
value.other_text.offer_of_units: of Rs. 10 each, issued at a premium approximately equal to the difference between face value and Allotment Price during the New Fund Offer and at NAV based prices on an ongoing basis.
value.scheme_objective: The  investment  objective  of  the  scheme  is  to  provide  returns  that,  before  expenses,  closely  correspond  to  the  total  returns  of  the  securities as represented by Nifty 50 Equal Weight Index, subject to  tracking error.     However,  there  is  no  guarantee  or  assurance  that  the  investment  objective of the scheme will be achieved.
value.suitable_for_investors: *:  Return that corresponds to the performance of the Nifty 50 Equal Weight Total Return Index subject to tracking error.  Long-term capital growth. *
value.type_of_scheme: An  open-ended  scheme  replicating/tracking  the  Nifty  50  Equal  Weight Total Return Index
